thread.title: Vishal Patel

author: Vishal Patel
title: Vishal Patel
text: I would avoid using FloraQueen as I just had my first and last experience with them. I ordered 12 deluxe red roses for my girlfriend in Australia so ended up paying â‚¬144 which you would expect some amazing roses however the roses were small and looked nothing like on the website, the teddy also purchased was damaged when delivered and to top it all off was delivered after office closing hours in which time my girlfriend had finished work! I sent numerous questions and had no replies, there's no contact number to ring... the whole experience was a complete disaster!
